original_text: And the suburbs of the city shall be toward the north two hundred and fifty, and toward the south two hundred and fifty, and toward the east two hundred and fifty, and toward the west two hundred and fifty.
korean_text: 그 성읍의 들은 북쪽으로 이백오십 척이요 남쪽으로 이백오십 척이요 동쪽으로 이백오십 척이요 서쪽으로 이백오십 척이며

sentences.original_text: And the suburbs of the city shall be
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 도시의 교외는 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: toward the north two hundred and fifty,
and toward the south two hundred and fifty,
and toward the east two hundred and fifty,
and toward the west two hundred and fifty.
